actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Shepaug River for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers Systems.

summary.text: Shepaug River Act - Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, the Shepaug River for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Shepaug River for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers Systems.
